com.paco.java.subway

Class IntersecLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paco.java.subway.NodeLink
      • com.paco.java.subway.IntersecLink

  • public class IntersecLink
extends NodeLink
    This class specializes the NodeLink class in order to focus exclusively on Intersection Links. Those links are exclusively between Intersection Node and / or to NodeLeaf type node
    Author:
    Pascal

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.paco.java.subway.NodeLink

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void UpdateDistance(int iDistanceAdd)
      This function simply allows to add a distance segment between 2 Intersctions or between this Intersection and a LeafNode.
